_sText:
This is the fixed version of my zombei escape map phantasy_escape

It’s dessigned for max. 64 Players!
Both teams start in a cave where they have 3 Options to go.
1 – take the green path to a labyrinth
2 – take the blue path to some dark rooms and flying bathtubs
3- take the red path to a gondola 
All these paths come together before a big river with a (very cute) dragon in it.
Here they need to defend the river for 30 seconds – 
Then the dragon starts moving to the other side. 
The humans now have to walk down a long tunnle.
At the end, there’s a nice little river – the boat should be the fastest way to cross it.
When the river is crossed, a teleporter brings the player to a huge lake with the holy pyramide in it’s middle – when the pyramide is defended for one minute a teleprt brings those who’re on top of it to a safe place and kills all the others (hopefully zombies)
THIS IS A VERY EARLY RELEASE! If you test it anyways please give me a quick feedback – I’d really be happy `bout that!
thanks and have fun
BRATMAXE

FIXED BUGS/OTHER STUFF:

- added barricades and trigger_push to keep zombies away for a moment
- boat and gondola cannot be blocked anymore
- fixed some texture stuff
- improved fps 
- some new textures and designs
- balance improvements
- fixed glitching spots
- Added AFK kills all around the map
